name: arch::kernel::apic::xapic::XApic::new

mm::mem_obj::HasPaddr::paddr.doc: Returns the start physical address of the memory object.

arch::kernel::apic::xapic::read_xapic_ba.doc:
Reads xAPIC base address from the MSR.

 # Safety

 The caller must ensure that xAPIC is present.

mm::mem_obj::HasSize::size.doc: Returns the size of the memory object in bytes.
